archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ADV003 Exploit vulnerable authorisation mechanisms
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The threat exploits vulnerabilities in the authorisation mechanisms of an organisation’s information systems in order to gain access to sensitive functions and information assets.
Assessment guidance: This threat event can manifest in a number of ways, including: ԉ bypassing authorisation checks ԉ privilege escalation attacks ԉ forced browsing/navigation
